addPicture.imposibleAddPicture: It is not possible to add more images

create.title: Do you want to make a request or create a project?
create.createRequestDes: Create a request for help to solve your personal problem in order to improve the quality of life; Such as asking for help for the cost of treatment
create.createProjectDes: Active collections to provide services to the community around them by creating projects can share their activities with others and ask for help from people's concerns. Such as creating a project to help the needy or helping to hold an event.

introduction.welcomeToUnityvoDes: Mofid is a platform for expanding voluntary activities and creating empathy and companionship to solve problems
introduction.createRequestDes: In this platform, you can easily raise your needs so that you can choose the Associations to meet your needs, or you can see a project that provides the service you need and you can request this service from it.
introduction.createProjectByAssociationDes: If you have a Association, you have come to the right place. Easily define your projects here so that everyone can see them and help you perform at your best.
introduction.participationInAppDes: If you don't have a Association, but you want to participate in voluntary work, you can help them by finding a project of your choice so that they can complete their work.

login.header: Enter your phone number, sign in

login.headerDes: If you have a voluntary team, log in as an association. Otherwise, log in as a user.
